title: ranged
name: Ranged DPS
role_text_md: With high party utility and unparalleled mobility, Physical Ranged jobs are masters of adjusting to suit the needs of the encounter at hand. Each Ranged job comes equipped with a party-wide 10% damage mitigation and a robust CC toolkit to keep their allies safe. With no cast bars or positional requirements, Ranged players can zoom around the battlefield and still dish out serious damage.
